author: senh
title: Talk about Travel
text: BING NEWS: Bonobo "Baby Talk" Reveals Roots of Human Language JACKSONVILLE, Florida—Like any precocious teen, Neely Ann is energetic and curious. She dances in great, looping circles while the fuddy-duddy adults lounge in the afternoon heat. Florida already feels like a sauna on this July day, but Neely Ann's ... 08/8/2015 - 9:40 pm | View Link Amanda Nunes ready for Ronda Rousey but won't talk trash like Bethe Correia Just when it looked like UFC women's bantamweight champion Ronda Rousey was running out of opponents, a new challenger emerges after Amanda Nunes knocked down and then choked out former title contender Sara McMann on Saturday night in Nashville. Nunes has ... 08/8/2015 - 9:32 pm | View Link Coaches talk hydration, heat illness prevention What: Razorback football coach Bret Bielema headlined the luncheon and shared with the coaches what he does to keep the football team well-hydrated. Some 425 people, mostly junior high and high school coaches, gathered for the Kendrick Fincher Hydration ... 08/8/2015 - 9:06 pm | View Link Stop telling women how to talk How many times in the last year have you read an article about what women should really stop doing, being or saying? The list of our “mistakes” seems endless. New entries appear virtually every day. We don’t negotiate — and when we do, we manage to ... 08/8/2015 - 8:43 pm | View Link PM Modi's Hamlet moment: To talk or not to talk to Pakistan? A new London production of Hamlet has caused a furore because of a mis-timing of Shakespeare’s famous soliloquy: “To be, or not to be…” Departing from the original play, where Hamlet ponders his existential dilemma in Act Three, this production ...
